title: Geospatial quality assessment of locally available ice for heavy metals and metalloids and their potential risks for human health in Karachi, Pakistan
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Aamir Alamgir, Qamar Ali, Noor Fatima, Moazzam Ali Khan, Muhammad Farrakh Nawaz, Somia Tariq, Muhammad Rizwan, Jean Wan Hong Yong
